attributes.action: Recognise the Charity efforts of Pope Benedict iv and the Royal Family
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pope Benedict encourages the effort of the Catholic peoples and others of goodwill to provide care and charity to others.
This charity involves speaking the truth, even if others dont want to hear eg, the battle against Aids, faithful married parents will prevent Aids not multiple partners and a little piece of plastic.
The Queen asks Governments to support mothers and fathers to support families, with a living wage.
The Church and the Royal Family recognises social issues are important as are good morals.
The Holy Father will be welcome to Great Britain next year and will continue his charitable teaching, may God bless our Pope and the Royal Family.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
